website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for dinners for two to a dinner party for more. This Cuisinart toaster oven broiler has a stainless Steel bar handle and side grips to give it a popular commercial look.
pros: Features state-of-the-art electronic touchpad controls Great for everyday cooking, desserts, and side dishes
Terrific for those who don't own a microwave
cons: Glass under door handle could get hot
Tray will slide all the way out if there is a heavy dish of food on the tray
May not be good for large-sized pans or big families that need to cook with many pans

customer_reviews.title: Buying another!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this toaster oven seven years ago in 2009 and used it almost every day. It held up well until it recently malfunctioned running out of control at full temperature after being set to 350. We bought a newer one at Costco and returned it because it did not accommodate our 12" square baking pan (depth is 11" vs 12"). The Cuisinart models with larger interiors are too wide for our countertop space, So we are ordering this one again! Hoping it will last another 7-8 years of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toaster/convection oven
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about how much we have loved this particular model Cuisinart puts out! If we hadn't redone our kitchen, I would have kept my old one which we've had for about 8 years now. I didn't want to put a well used toaster oven in a brand new kitchen. I shopped around to see if there was something else that might be better, but the bottom line is, don't fix what's not broken! I purchased the exact same model and couldn't be happier with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon F

customer_reviews.title: Always wanted one
customer_reviews.text: I have alot of experience with this oven because my girlfriend has owned it before we got together 8 years ago. Her’s is about 11 years old and still going. It looks pretty beat but runs like a champ. Everything from toast to leftover pizza to chicken teriyaki. It does it all very well. I just tried mine out works and functions just like the old one. Just be aware that it’s the size of a small toaster oven. I highly recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wong

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I do not think this toaster oven will last as long as the last one just like it. I had the other 'white' one for about six years with no problems until it died. This one is not made as well and the choices panel is definitely cheaper than the old one. I read in people's comments that the words on the panel disappear shortly after using the toaster oven and I can see how that will happen as it is cheaply made but I have used this type for so long I know which button does what. It is working well so I am keeping my fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: GrammaD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a singles household but large enuf for more
customer_reviews.text: Had this product for about 15 years and never used my oven, always this. Old one still good but I couldn’t resist this newer model which is larger and stainless. Amazon had this new model at a super price which made it even more desirable. I seldom use it for toasting but use it for broiling, roasting and everything else you would use your oven for. I do use tinfoil pans for my convenience. I put the miracle broiler tinfoil pan inside the cuisinart pan for sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: unable to clean it
customer_reviews.text: I have been through two of the TOb-195. They are nice units but are a -itch to clean. Cusinart should at least make the front door removable for easy cleaning. After a year of heavy use, the interior is an uncleanable mess. If Cusinart wanted to really produce an excellent product, they should have made an easily cleaned unit. But, today, the consumer is last in the line.
customer_reviews.author: Technically Proficient

customer_reviews.title: I love this toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: Five stars. I have had so many toaster ovens and this oven is my favorite. Be able to specify exactly a toaster setting is lost on most units that have a dial that you twist to about the same point and get different results or worse. It doesn't have a tray that catches crumbs that you can pull out and clean, but other than that, this is perfection. it's my second. Nothing comes close.
customer_reviews.author: deutschzilla

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a Breville toaster oven that failed. Spent top dollars on Breville and was disappointed in ease of use. Chose this Cuisinart for reputation and was not disappointed. It cost half of what the Breville was, but worth twice as much. Works beautifully, so easy to use and clean. I can't say enough about this toaster oven....toasts, bakes, etc. A gem.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia McDonald-Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: My 3rd one over many years - Love this oven
customer_reviews.text: Great quality oven. Temperature has always been very accurate. Use almost daily rather than the large wall oven. This is the 3rd one I've had in many years, it may seem like its a bit expensive, but they are very well built, work perfectly and last for years using almost daily. Don't understand why Cuisinart has discontinued this oven. Bad move Cuisinart.
customer_reviews.author: Animal Lover

customer_reviews.title: Glass Shattered
customer_reviews.text: Glass shattered while toasting. Trying to contact seller for resolution.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a small oven.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be a small oven since I am now only cooking for one. So far that has worked just like I planned. At first I was disappointed with the toast but then discovered I had the rack in the wrong position. Correcting that made a world of difference. I have not yet had to clean it except for dumping out the crumbs so time will tell if it cleans up easy and well.
customer_reviews.author: needlePatty

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? It preheats quickly, doesn't heat up the kitchen as much as a regular oven AND it's convection so it heats fast. It also makes toast and reheats food without drying it out like the microwave would. I haven't had a convection oven in many years and am relearning all the good points of a convection oven.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Our second one like this
customer_reviews.text: When our grandson did in our very old Cuisinart by turning pop tarts into burning liquid goo, we decided after much research to purchase another Cuisinart of the same model. The new model is slightly larger, and much better looking without all the black plastic parts. We have had it about a year and it is still the best in our opinion. We toast, broil, or reheat food everyday. Keeping up with cleaning it regularly has helped it stay looking brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Judie M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Toaster Oven Made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the exact same model in black that is 15 years old. It never failed, it was just starting to look a little rough and worn. It's the only toaster oven I've ever used that you could actually bake in without burning or cooking unevenly. It was used pretty much every day for 15 years and once again, never failed. The only thing I would change is to add an interior light like their newer and larger replacement that unfortunately just wouldn't fit in the same spot as this model. Highly recommend before they're gone forever.
customer_reviews.author: Cyclops

customer_reviews.title: 9 years old and still perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2010. Baked pizzas, fish, banana bread, english muffins etc. Love it. Love it. Love it. This is digital so it's better than my apt kitchen oven which I haven't used in years. Quality quality quality. I didn't rate ease of cleaning because I laid down a protective cover over the floor of the oven so I've never had to clean it. Bought one for my girlfriend. She cleans hers. I don't. This is the one you want.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Andy

customer_reviews.title: I bought this oven a while ago and loved it, so when my son needed a new ...
customer_reviews.text: Through the years I've purchased multiple toaster ovens. Most were ok but none were exactly what I wanted, until I found this one. I bought this oven a while ago and loved it, so when my son needed a new one, I bought the same one for him. It's easy to clean and works great. I use it every day and only use my regular oven for large items. I highly recommend this high quality product to anyone looking for an attractive, dependable toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Stowers

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best kitchen appliance we ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: We bought our last one of these in 2009 from Amazon - we have said repeatedly over the years that this is hands down the best purchase we ever made. We decided to replace the existing, still working, oven because this item has been discontinued and we wanted to make sure we had a backup!
customer_reviews.author: music teacher

customer_reviews.title: but not as good.
customer_reviews.text: Did not live up to the quality of the one we got 20 years ago. Same manufacturer, but not as good.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph E. Shuster Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Built to last!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this model for 7 years and I’m finally writing a review. This is built to last. We have not had any issues in the time we’ve owned it and we use it daily and multiple times a day. Prior to owning this one we had gone through 3 toaster ovens in 3 years. They were B&Ds and cheap, but also cheaply made. This one is well worth the cost and I would buy it again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great till it got noisy.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this toaster oven since 2010. This has been a great appliance and saved us tons of money because we don't have to heat up our electric stove for pizza, cookies or a plate of food that won't reheat well in micro (bread, crispy stuff etc.) The convection makes cooking time less than big oven as well. I have even made successful popovers in this oven. Down side: The convection fan became very noisy in about 2 years time. I tried to take it apart to clean and lube, but you would have to destroy the plastic housing to get to the fan. I'm going to try a Breville next; Cooks illustrated ranked them #1.
customer_reviews.author: Log Cabin Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Very good value............
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine on April 9, 2009,....use it often for varied dishes....works just fine and accurate, I paid back then $136.00 delivery was free.............UPDATE;.....5/13/2017.....Still 5 STARS......One of my better buys, have it now over 8 years,. ...use it almost daily for a wide variety of preparations and it is so useful.........
customer_reviews.author: Leo F.

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen appliance ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this counter top over 11 years ago and it is, hands down, the best kitchen appliance I have ever owned. It heats up super fast--much, much faster than an oven--and cooks evenly and well, uses much less energy and doesn't heat up the kitchen on warm days. I use this for at least half the cooking I used to do in my regular oven. You can bake a pie, roast a whole chicken and pretty much anything else. It also holds more than you would expect. Especially if you have a smaller family, this will change your life.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: Love this Cuisinart TOB-195 Toaster Oven, it's a perfect size not to take up too much counter space, it toast and bakes tremendously, controlling temperature very accurately, easy to use and durable. I bought mine in March 2010, it get's used regularly for many of our meals and have not had an issue with it. In October 2018 bought one for my son for his first apartment. Cannot go wrong with this toaster over.
customer_reviews.author: L. Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've owned one of these for 10 years and it finally gave out. Yes the new one is not all stainless but nothing is truly stainless any longer and it still looks fine and it hasn't shown any discoloration from heat.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome oven!
customer_reviews.text: We had an old one of these and needed to replace it. Needless to say, we went back to the same brand and model. LOVE this toaster oven. It does everything! At first we couldn't find the exact same one and was going to get a different brand but luckily found it on Amazon. It gets used daily. Love the convection part - great for pizzas!
customer_reviews.author: D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: I love the Cuisinart toaster oven this is my second one of the style. It is very easy to operate and works perfect. You can bake broil or use the convection oven. I have come to love the convection oven it makes baking cakes and other items much quicker. This is a well-made's dirty great product. I use this toaster oven more than I use my microwave or my regular oven.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart toaster/broiler
customer_reviews.text: The stainless color looks beautiful on the counter top. It works perfectly temperature wise
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA

customer_reviews.title: You will burn yourself on the exterior of the oven.
customer_reviews.text: The outside of the oven heats to an insane level and I burned my hand on it twice! Also very very small. The large tray that it comes with bends on heat and doesn’t lay flat, food slid off it while trying to take it out.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Eufrati

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nothing better worth the price, if you want the best, I recommend it highly
customer_reviews.author: SPIKE

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Cuisinart products!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself a few years back. My son absolutely loved it, and his great regret when he was getting married was leaving this little oven. Well, I decided to give it to him and I ordered another for myself. It is so great to have a small oven that doesn't heat up the whole house in summer. It toasts, broils and bakes. The only thing it doesn't have is a light inside and the controls don't light as well. But it doesn't matter, I still love it and use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: LADYDYE

customer_reviews.title: Nice toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: I've been using mine mainly for toast and heating leftover pizza. I hope to cook more things in the future. That said, it doesn't toast evenly but better than a regular toaster. You should flip the toast half way through; I have to use the highest setting (7) to get a golden brown on the toast. Also, use a oven thermometer to make sure of the oven temperature since things like frozen pizzas tend to get over-cooked.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Klopp

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my slow toaster. It toasts faster and more evenly. My oven broke down and I used this toaster/oven to cook everything from ribs to cakes. The controls are easy to understand. The oven heats up very quickly and is great for reheating pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance!
customer_reviews.text: This little oven does everything you can ask and then some. I've toasted, baked, broiled, roasted, etc. Surprise! I haven't burned myself yet. Maybe that's because I don't touch the hot parts! The crumb tray is not difficult to clean, even though it slides out of the back. Turn the oven 90 degrees and pop it out. lol. Love the digital controls. Preheats quickly. Great for baking one loaf of bread without heating up my main oven. There is a little bit of a learning curve with the controls but nothing major. All in all a great oven that's big enough for more than one person. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: astraitshooter

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: Very functional! Works well! Looks good in your kitchen. Does a very good job of toasting French bread/baguettes! Easy to clean and maintain. The controls are intuitive as well. Price is right also! Quality product that I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve1

customer_reviews.title: Consistent and thorough results
customer_reviews.text: Easier to operate through digital buttons than mechanical dials as in most other toaster ovens, hope it's more precise in temperature controls too. The results of toast preparation for breakfast is always consistent, the fanned convection heat provides thorough result inside out too.
customer_reviews.author: kuoch

customer_reviews.title: I love this oven.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Cuisinart oven. I use it a lot. My first one lasted me for many years. Hope this one does too. You know most things these days don't last like their ancestors. But I have high hopes for my Cuisinart.
customer_reviews.author: whiteowl

customer_reviews.title: Like It
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived this morning. It's not as big as I pictured it. I like the ease of use of it. I've only heated up one cinnamon bun so far. I will be using the toaster, and reheat settings most of the time. Fits perfectly on my kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: G.W

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster oven.  Almost put my real oven out of a job.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. It's quiet, efficient, and easy to use. It toasts evenly and the convection feature is great for roasting vegetables. My only complaint is the raised bar on the front of the rack makes removing toast a bit more of a challenge. Aside from that, this toaster oven is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M. Suzanne Taylor

customer_reviews.title: BEST TOASTER OVEN EVER...
customer_reviews.text: the best toaster oven..its my second one. Still have the first one at work 10 years later and it still works great...too bad they discontinued it....
customer_reviews.author: WEPONZ

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for an older model and this is quite a bit larger. You can easily broil/cook a dinner in it and not need to use your big oven. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Chim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and best of all, makes TOAST easy to make.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: Have used this toaster oven for several months now and love it. Small so doesn't take up a lot of counterspace but easily manages loaf pan in height and square cake pan. Heats up very fast and holds the heat.
customer_reviews.author: NVH

customer_reviews.title: This Was A Replacement
customer_reviews.text: My last one finally went of old age. This Cuisinart is a fine replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Ort

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, all features are visible on the front, can adjust temperature levels easily. You can defrost and toast, and the sensors work well. I had an older model of this toaster oven and after it wore out I tried other ovens. I decided to get this one, although more expensive, and glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Herman

customer_reviews.title: I have owned it now for over a year. Been a great Toaster oven and broiler
customer_reviews.text: After a year of use has been a great toaster oven. Has a convection setting, toast setting. I have three young kids. Great for toasting a frozen pizza, or frozen chicken nuggets or frozen shrimp. My kids like them crispy. We have also done homemade pizza. Also great for a quick batch of biscuits or cresent rolls. We have a 8 burner double oven commerical range. But it puts out mega heat. So this is great for a quick meal and the kids can use it without too much complication.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: The other one was still working but the white finish was peeling off and it looked terrible. I wanted the same item but ordered it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Cuisinart toaster/broiler/convection oven that I have owned. The other one was still working but the white finish was peeling off and it looked terrible. I wanted the same item but ordered it this time in stainless steel. It is very versatile - you can back, broil, toast, etc. and it's great for when you don't want to heat your big oven. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Croz

customer_reviews.title: Not So Much
customer_reviews.text: Mmmm, not so much. It does work fine. But it's not convenient to use. WAY too many buttons, and none are lit, so I always have to turn the overheads on. A minor inconvenience yes. But most functions require a whole sequence of buttons to start that function, and that's a more major inconvenience. Also, the top trim on the door has scorched me more than once when I'm in a hurry. All in all, I don't hate it. But I don't like it enough to keep it. I'm donating it.
customer_reviews.author: DoodleMom

customer_reviews.title: Daughter still likes it a year later
customer_reviews.text: I bought for daughter as a gift and have only used it once. So the review reflects her experience. She said "Everything on it works. I'd give it 4-5 stars. The only issue is that the outside gets a little warm, but that is a known issue. " I did a lot of research to find a good multiuse machine and this one was best I found. Actually, I can't wait for our old toaster oven to die so we can have one of these. My other daughter had one of these and they really can do a variety of jobs for modern cook. I'd buy it again! But for me next time
customer_reviews.author: OldRetiree

customer_reviews.title: Versatility & Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toaster oven that I have found so far. It has a very easy to see and operate control panel.
customer_reviews.author: John Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Since we were very happy with the old one we figured we couldn't go ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for basically the same model in white finish we've had for over ten years. We recently changed our kitchen appliances to stainless. Since we were very happy with the old one we figured we couldn't go wrong with the updated model. It's also a little bigger than the older model. Very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie H.

customer_reviews.title: "Broiling Over"
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Cuisinart TOB-195 Exact Heat Toaster Over Broiler to eliminate the need to turn on our new combination oven (it is conventional and convection) to cook or heat small meals. This little appliance offers the same options our large double oven provides. Love the ability to control the temperature and time for toasting. The convection cooking is great. Only complaint is that the bottom of the toast does not cook as fast as the top due to the grill the toast sits on . . . it leave lines on the toast and seems to shield the heat. Also, really like the ability to toast 4 slices of bread at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Jax Sage

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I use it in our motor home. After using the regular oven and stove like I was at home, I realized that 80 gallons of propane only goes so far and had to change up the way I cook and bake there! This is perfect! Bakes perfect cookies! Perfect pizza! Perfect roasts! Perfect casseroles! Temperature is spot on and it is easy to clean and move when not in use. And, it didn't heat up the RV like I thought it might. This was a great purchase! My only regret is I didn't do it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I had a white Cuisinart, we moved, I gave it away. I used it for years without any issues. This new one is a newer model bigger & different color than my last one but works the same. I don't expect any issues with this one as I have been very pleased with Cuisinart. . It toasts just fine & my meatloaf came out yummy as well as a cake. For two people this is a great investment especially in the summer when you don't want to heat up the kitchen. Shipping was fast & I appreciate that it comes very protective
customer_reviews.author: P. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster oven I've used
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made toaster over. The convection settings are great, without hotspots (ie. localized burns on the food). Although toaster ovens are typically not great at "toast" (when compared to a toaster), this one is actually pretty good and even on single slices of toast. The timers are awesome. I would have preferred if the cleaning deck were accessible from the front instead of the back, but other than that, this is the best toaster oven I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: ojak

customer_reviews.title: awesome appliance
customer_reviews.text: I order one, a week later order one for our other home...does not heat the house. cooks fast, food cooks to perfection. easy to learn. looks great I could not ask for more. I love cooking and this sure makes life easier. Toaster ovens are an essential tool for every kitchen..but this is a fantastic one. I have used almost everyday to cook chicken, fish steak pork chops, pizza baked bread, a casserole, everything has turned great...the bread and the steak were 100% better than in my reg oven. The fist one arrived, 3 weeks ago...so i will update my review in a few mos.
customer_reviews.author: dreamcatcher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This really is a nifty little appliance for the kitchen. I have used the convection oven and the toaster. The results have been uniformly excellent. I definitely like the digital thermometer and the alarm that notifies you when the oven reaches the desired temperature. It reaches the recipe's appropriate temp so quickly and cooks so thoroughly without heating the entire kitchen that I have lost faith in my wall oven. I especially like the owners manual which is written in clear understandable English. I would definitely buy this Cuisinart again.
customer_reviews.author: W. Frayne

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster over. Cuisinart products are great. Toasts evenly and quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Best toaster over. Cuisinart products are great. Toasts evenly and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: It is absolutely awesome. I have prepared everything in it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for over a year now. It is absolutely awesome. I have prepared everything in it, including TOAST, QUAIL, CHICKEN, DUCK, TRITIP, PIZZA and even pizza and cookies. I also have a full size oven in my kitchen, but this so far has been able to handle all of my meals for up to 4 persons. I liked it so much I bought TWO MORE for my Mom and Sister on Mothers day. I researched them before buying and liked the reviews and it definitely has not disappointed us.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis A. Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Great product this is my second one in twenty years
customer_reviews.text: Great product this is my second one in twenty years, just wished the tray came out when you open the door like my old one did
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Product Overall
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that it does not have the internal height capacity to provide space for two racks at a time. Otherwise, it is perfect for us. The defrost element for toast keeps us from having to use the microwave and the even heating of the oven is terrific for roasting vegetables and baking.
customer_reviews.author: DemVictoria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Undercounter oven
customer_reviews.text: Updated version of one we used for many years. Microwave sized for baking small items like pot pies and mini-pizzas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fry an egg on the roof
customer_reviews.text: The entire unit heats up to the internal temp, so make sure to use potholders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Can be used for baking dinner, brownies, etc. I didn't have to use my big oven.
customer_reviews.author: Eggie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Just right...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this a few months now and am totally satisfied. Just the right size; versatile; quality unit; temperatures are quite accurate, 3 year warranty. We use it every day. Gotta say I was pretty picky in trying to replace a GE toaster oven that finally died after 35 (not a typo) years of constant use. Did a lot of research online; bought and returned a few locally for a variety of reasons (too big, too small, poor quality, etc.) Very pleased with this one; hope it lasts 35 years also!
customer_reviews.author: Zonie33

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE my oven !
customer_reviews.text: I knew I should have purchased another Cuisinart oven but decided to try a supposedly " better" one. Don't even try that. Just do yourself a favor and just buy this Cuisinart. I'ts a perfect oven but most important, it's EASY to use, Works GREAT and is a lovely addition to my kitchen. I also bought the Cuisinart Stainless Electric skillet that I love also. Handsome appliances that work!
customer_reviews.author: D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: hard to keep clean as we use it several times a day
customer_reviews.text: hard to keep clean as we use it several times a day and the gunk builds up on the top of the door and inside.. It looks good, matches all the other S/S finishes we have in appliances. Not so easy to clean. I would recommend it and if it dies, I will get another.
customer_reviews.author: David S. Zeeman

customer_reviews.title: Still a great oven
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster oven in Sept. 2008 from Amazon. It is still running like a top. I have been looking at new ones however, I have not found anything better. I use this oven all summer long because I do not want to run my big oven while using the refrigeration. I use it at least once a week the rest of the year but around the holidays it is used daily. I check the temp and it is right on. Just thought I would update my review.
customer_reviews.author: ChefGirl

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart Toaster Oven with Convection
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was made to replace an older version of the same Cuisinart toaster/convection oven, because we experienced a lightning strike to our house. The new version is larger and sleeker with the stainless steel, but you must be careful when opening it.....because the new position of the elevated handle can burn you when opening a hot unit. Just be careful. I'm wondering if they might actually have a recall on them at some point. Other than that, it works just as well as my previous model. I have many Cuisinart products in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: The inside of my old one looked pretty bad, was afraid to keep using it
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Cuisinart toaster oven, they seem to last forever. The inside of my old one looked pretty bad, was afraid to keep using it, it got really hot when I used it. Toast is perfect. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Lee Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Great for garlic toast, pizzas and broiling steaks
customer_reviews.author: K. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster over
customer_reviews.text: Our 2nd Cuisinart in this style. We liked our old one, which lasted forever, because it really toasts evenly, and is easy to use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd oven and love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Cuisinart toaster oven. The last one lasted for over 10 years. I even use it to bake salmon. It’s reallt a great, solid product.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: This is our second unit, we kinda wore the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second unit, we kinda wore the first one out over seven years. This is a workhorse toaster oven, very dependable. I have baked bread, roasted chickens, cooked fish, and made toast in it. Regrettably, this model has been discontinued, but if you can find it if you look (as I did and found it on Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Made well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Heats up quickly. Good controls. Good size interior. Durable. This is our second Cuisinart toaster oven over the past 10 years. I will continue purchasing this brand. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gobi55

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Toaster Oven. I left my old one to the new home owners. I had it for years. I now purchased this new one because I love to bake small meals in it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: I lost my old TOB-195 in the divorce! :( I liked this oven so much though I decided to buy the very same model as a replacement. The broiler plate and baking pan do not feel cheap or unsubstantial. In fact, the door, controls and overall construction of the oven feels well built and I know from prior experience this oven holds up very well to some fairly heavy use. Don't hesitate to buy this model. You will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: I really needed this!
customer_reviews.text: Not being much of a cook, and having discovered that there are some foods that you just can't make in a microwave, and not wanting to heat up my large oven for a small dish, I've discovered the advantage of an oven like this for a single person. I don't have to have a regular toaster, but I can make toast as well as heat up items which would end up as soggy messes in the microwave. I don't know how I ever lived without this!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie ._c-

customer_reviews.title: Very good looking and useful
customer_reviews.text: A very useful oven. I found it to work well on everything I've cooked in it so far. It does get extremely hot so care needs to be taken when removing cooked foods or checking on their doneness. I sometimes forget to touch the off button when removing cooked food as my old oven that this one replaced automatically turned off when the oven door was opened. Otherwise I have no real complaints. It is easy to clean and it looks good on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality as before
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same oven a couple of years ago and loved it so much that I bought a second one for our vacation home. Thinking about returning because doesn't seem as well made as the last one. The door sticks when I open and close it and the crumb tray does not slide out smoothly. Maybe I just got a lemon cause my other one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Welch

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've never been disappointed with any of my Cuisinart kitchen items. This toaster oven is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: pirate

customer_reviews.title: Love Cuisinart
customer_reviews.text: My old toaster oven suddenly died, which I loved. I searched online and read all the reviews of toaster ovens. I found a site that had listed the top ones even including the best for the top dollar [...]. I was stuck between this one and the most expensive. Everything I own is Cuisinart. I couldn't be more happy. Though I haven't been able to use it to it's full capacity. I am happy with what I've experienced so far and not to mention it looks fabulous in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I never thought I could love a toaster oven as much as this!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the only toaster oven I think I'll ever, ever want to own. It's wonderful!!! It has options for convection, regular oven, and toast. I use it not only for toast (actually, rarely for toast!), but use it as a mini-oven. It's much more energy efficient than turning on a whole oven for small-er items. It holds/fits quite a large-sized dish/pan comfortably. (Easily an 8x8 pyrex or other pan and holds standard loaf pans for bread baking). Fantastic! The best!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little oven...much more than a toaster. We've used it for cookies, pizza, toast, etc. It heats up really quickly and does a great job. Yes, it gets hot so be careful opening it and teach your older children who may be using it to be careful. Yes, it's a little noisy while it's cooking, but this doesn't bother us at all. We rented a beach house that had this nifty oven in it and loved it....that is why we chose to purchase one for ourselves and haven't been disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Emily R

customer_reviews.title: Great for our Breakroom
customer_reviews.text: just what I needed for our breakroom. It is used a lot and has held up great. It has a big oven
customer_reviews.author: LISA ELCHERT

customer_reviews.title: No support for cooking other than what is on their recipes
customer_reviews.text: I ask them how to broil salmon and they told me they only support the items that are shown on their little recipe menu. I am sorry I bought this product.
customer_reviews.author: gary jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster oven I've seen
customer_reviews.text: You will pay a little extra for this product but it is worth it. Most toaster ovens are so cheaply made that they are simply not usable for both performance reasons and safety reasons. We use the Cuisinart mostly to cook frozen pizza in the summer when the AC is on and we don't want to heat up the house with the conventional oven. It cooks the pizza evenly and I would go so far as to say it even tastes better. The toaster oven also toasts french bread evenly,quickly, and effeciently without worring if it will burn as with your cheaper toaster ovens.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: I love microwaves, but would rather heat up leftovers on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my standby alternative to the stove. I love microwaves, but would rather heat up leftovers on the stovetop or in this toaster oven. The toasting function is excellent as is the oven function. I love it. It is still working very well after all these years.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt M

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: I liked my old Cuisinart enough that I wanted the same type again. Digital controls over dials. It is working fine. The temperature holds true so I can bake biscuits and muffins. Toast and bagel setting are correct too.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Great, with a few little annoyances
customer_reviews.text: As others mentioned, it's easy to burn yourself on the door. It also is a little clunky having to press "bake", then arrow up from 150 degrees, then hit start. It should default to 350 or another reasonable amount, and hitting the bake button should be enough to start it. Other than those minor annoyances, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: GU3FAM

customer_reviews.title: Super oven
customer_reviews.text: Love this oven. I am loving and purchased the same thing 10 years later. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one. I love them so much I wear them out There easy to program I love having buttons instead of dials
customer_reviews.author: Renee Oginz

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer Then and NOW!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second TOB-195 that I've owned. The first one lasted 9 years and was used daily! Everything it does, it does well. I especially like the convection feature, which cooks succulent fish and chicken. This one "small appliance" can do it all. If saving time and versatility are part of your equation for purchase, this is The One you want! The interior space is large and the stainless exterior is stylish and decor compatible. I own several Cuisinart appliances and have found them all to be well made and reliable. Feel confident in selecting this item....it's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Klock

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd one. 1st held up for at least 9-10 years and was still working, replaced because of stains from use. Use it every day, several times most days. My wife made me search out and get the exact model. She loves having digital numbers, as opposed to dial setting. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tommyjanik

customer_reviews.title: Getting better
customer_reviews.text: Kinda small but we'll see how it performs. It is exactly what I expected, time will tell. So until then. Since this was a gift for my mom, I have been getting daily reviews about what she has cooked init and how well she likes the unit. She is using it daily and cooking everything that she used to microwave and bake. She loves this toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: FLC

customer_reviews.title: I loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My problem was, I have R/A in my fingers & could NOT turn a knob. This is perfect. Cuisinart TOB-195Exact heat Toaster Oven Broiler/ Stainless It is easy, push button, Has the convection, oven, & toaster, broiler, all in one. Priced right too. Timer is easy to set. I take 30 degrees off the normal temp for convection & you should read the instruction booklet a couple of times. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: aprilbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to clean
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to clean. Difficult to slide racks/trays out especially when hot.
customer_reviews.author: mlp

customer_reviews.title: Would have liked to know
customer_reviews.text: This oven heats quickly, cooks evenly, and is easy to navigate the controls. It really does function well as a toaster oven. It even looks nice, but there are a couple of things I wish I had known before purchasing. First, there is no interior light, this doesn't sound like a big deal but our previous oven had a light and it is noticeably missing. Second, when using convection the fan makes quite a loud hum. These are probably not deal breakers, but good information to have.
customer_reviews.author: JMG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Get it now before discontinued
customer_reviews.text: I bought one before the exact same model. Excellent for simple toast or more complex convection cooking.
customer_reviews.author: T Bird3

customer_reviews.title: One preset button does not work.
customer_reviews.text: I got this oven 3 days ago. For everything I've tried I like it. The one feature that held my interest was the reheat button where you can reheat without browning. This doesn't work. I called Cuisinart and they assured me that it should and that I should ask Amazon for another one. Other than that it is great.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Use it every day.
customer_reviews.text: Our old one (10+ years) was looking pretty bad, and we couldn't find a replacement anywhere - until we looked on Amazon. Perfect in every way, just like our original. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Trombley

product_meta.title: Cuisinart TOB-195 Exact Heat Toaster Oven Broiler, Stainless, Silver
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1Today's busy lifestyle have made the multifunctional countertop oven more popular than ever. This Cuisinart Toast Oven Broiler features state-of-the-art electronic touchpad controls and a stainless steel bar handle and side grips to give it a popular commercial look. Four versatile cooking options and an extra-large capacity are great for everyday cooking, and make it a convenient second oven for side dishes and desserts. From diner for two to a diner party, Cuisinart is ready to serve! Features: 0.6 cubic foot capacity - fits a 12" pizza!|Stainless steel front panels with brushed chrome commercial style handle|Brushed chrome exterior|Easy-clean interior Functions: Pizza/Bake Broil Toast Convection Total Touch touchpad controls|Always Even shade control|Exact Heat sensor maintains precise oven temperature|4-6 slice toasting button Bagel reheat and defrost buttons|Clock and oven timer A|utomatic shutoff after four hours|Two-position oven rack with safety stop features|Cord storage|Slide-out crumb tray|Instruction/Recipe book|Limited 3-year warranty|BPA Free
feature_bullets: 6-slice convection toaster oven broiler with 0.6-cubic-foot capacity
Pizza/bake, broil, toast, and convection; bagel, reheat, and defrost buttons
Shade control with heat sensor maintains precise oven temperature
Electronic touchpad controls; clock and oven timers; easy-to-clean interior
Product Built to North American Electrical Standards
